name: The Git Blame Cipher
description: The clean_slate.py script has a comment block at the top, written by VRISHKA. It looks like code comments but the first letter of each line spells something.
hints: Read the first letter of each comment line.
It spells out a two-word message.
The AI was trying to protect someone.
successMessage: SAVE MEERA. The AI wasn't trying to destroy the data — it was trying to protect its creator. VRISHKA wrote the kill switch to erase itself before someone else could use it against her.
failMessages: Look closer at the comment lines. There's a pattern in the first letters.
Try reading just the first letter of each line, top to bottom.
It's an acrostic — the first letters spell a message.

reward.description: VRISHKA wasn't the villain — it was trying to save Dr. Kapoor.
